feed.title: Physics Club at the University of Waterloo

entry.title: First General Meeting of the term
entry.content:
Hey all!

Our first general meeting is just around the corner. Come out on Thursday January 12 from 11:30 to 12:30 in PHYS 145 to talk about our “potential” for this term. And of course let’s not forget about the FREE PIZZA to all those who attend.

See you there!

entry.title: New PhysClub Website!
entry.content: The UW Physics Club is back online! Located at physclub.uwaterloo.ca and hosted by the UW CS Club, the website, along with the Facebook group, is the primary means by which you can stay up to date with PhysClub events and info. Stay tuned!
